detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.

Short dress in soft, ribbed jersey with lace trims, a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative ties at one side. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in soft, ribbed jersey with lace trims, a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative ties at one side. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Ankle-length boiler suit in an airy cotton weave with a resort collar, chest pockets and an elasticated waist. Buttons down the front and half-length sleeves with sewn-in turn ups.

Mesh blouse with an embroidered pattern, sequins, a small V-neck and ties at the neckline. Frilled yoke front and back and short sleeves with a frill trim. The blouse is lined with a jersey strappy top.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, and soft fleece inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, and soft fleece inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Suit trousers in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges, a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

LIMITED EDITION. Kaftan in softly draping viscose satin with a slight sheen and decorative sequins. Round neckline, a small opening at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a pleat at the back for added width and drape. Unlined.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with welded seams, reflective details and a detachable, fleece-lined hood with an elasticated edge. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, padded raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Fleece lining front and back, and a woven lining in the sleeves. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with welded seams, reflective details and a detachable, fleece-lined hood with an elasticated edge. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, padded raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Fleece lining front and back, and a woven lining in the sleeves. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

LIMITED EDITION. Kaftan in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and visible seam down the front. Long fringes at the cuffs, a pleat at the back for added movement and drape, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight, jacquard-weave tunic in a viscose and cotton blend with a glittery thread pattern. High-cut neckline with a grandad collar, an opening at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, short sleeves and a pleat at the back.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight, jacquard-weave tunic in a viscose and cotton blend with a glittery thread pattern. High-cut neckline with a grandad collar, an opening at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, short sleeves and a pleat at the back.
Waist belt in imitation suede with a tortoiseshell-patterned buckle at the front. Width 5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Wide, sturdy belt with a metal buckle that has a stud at the back. Width 3.4 cm.

Belt in grained imitation leather with an adjustable, mini bucket bag with a drawstring closure at the top. Lined. The belt has a stud fastening. Size 4.5x12x14 cm. Width of belt 2 cm.
Waist belt in braided imitation leather with a metal buckle at the front and elastication at the back. Width 7 cm.
LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length dress in soft, jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck, concealed, gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect, and short dolman sleeves with wide hems. Lined.
Belt in imitation leather with a perforated pattern and metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Belt in imitation leather with a perforated pattern and metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Metal waist belt with round links, a carabiner hook at one end and a round metal loop at the other. Width approx. 2 cm.
Braided plastic waist belt with a covered metal buckle. Width 4.5 cm.
Narrow waist belt with a pouch that can be worn as a stylish waist bag. The pouch has a flap and press-stud. Size of pouch 11x16.5 cm. Width of belt 2.5 cm.
5-pocket shorts in cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket shorts in cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket shorts in cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and straight, wide legs.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in soft ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an open chest pocket, buttons on the shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in soft ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an open chest pocket, buttons on the shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

LIMITED EDITION. Long, sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Small opening at the back with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and concealed zip, a seam at the waist and straight-cut skirt that flares gently at the hem. Lined.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short, wide-fitting dress in a crinkled weave made partly from recycled polyester. V-neck, short cap sleeves and a flare to the hem. Lined.

Short dress in an airy, jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell and viscose blend. Double layer at the top and a halter neck with wide straps that can be tied in various ways. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back, a seam with a draped section under the bust and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Short, flared dress in pleated chiffon made partly from recycled polyester with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a grandad collar, V-neck opening and concealed buttons down the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short skirt in a cotton and linen weave with broderie anglaise. Concealed zip in one side, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and draping with a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a collar and V-neck with a seam centre front. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.

Maxi dress in a jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell and viscose blend. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck opening front and back, and ties at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a decorative tie detail at the front, and a softly draping skirt with a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Trousers in a softly draping, patterned weave made partly from recycled polyester. High waist with gathered elastication at the sides, diagonal side pockets, a low crotch and straight, wide legs.
Flared top in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave. Narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short shorts in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a regular waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners.
A-line coat in soft, felted fabric with a detachable, lined hood, buttons at the front, a yoke front and back and patch front pockets. Lined.

LIMITED EDITION. Wide dress in lace made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with flared cuffs. Straight cut with a seam at the waist and gentle gathers at the bottom for width and drape. V-neck underdress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides.

Padded jacket in a coated weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs. Partly lined in pile.

Padded jacket in a coated weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs. Partly lined in pile.

Longer down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Longer down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Calf-length jumpsuit in crinkled jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Straight, wide legs.

Calf-length jumpsuit in crinkled jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Straight, wide legs.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
